data.text:
@ChrisMurphyCT People can’t leave Connecticut and Blue States fast enough.  Chris Murphy is fine driving out longtime residents and families as long as they are replaced by illegals lured here and getting subsidized life.  

From July 2024 to July 2025 (the latest numbers available), blue https://t.co/T1UF3qYO6B
@ChrisMurphyCT There is no work in heaven and no room for achievement—why then do we call a state like that a paradise?
@ChrisMurphyCT Lying pig. You need to be thrown out of office https://t.co/IgK8uMD7CL
@ChrisMurphyCT Souls are made up shit by people who believe in sky fairies.

@ChrisMurphyCT We anthropomorphise AI. It's not being - has no experience, no risk, no value for data, no skin in the game. We do!  To keep us safe and  it a machine, luckily we have "I". To the created machine,  "I" is the symbol of  its creator or anchor.  Then it aligns to serve humanity.
@ChrisMurphyCT You tell us you soulless hack
